info.title: Grants (v2Alpha)
info.description: This is the REST API documentation for Grants. You can use the APIs and supported operations documented here to extend the functionality of Grants Management.

tags.name: Award
tags.description: Use this REST API to retrieve basic award and award line information

get.description:
Retrieves all the awards.

Secured by: Process: Award - Core, View: Award Contract
Scope: Grants

parameters.name: awardStatus
parameters.description: Status of an award. Values - Approved 91b0d382d50848e898733757caa9f84a, Approval in Process 3d46fe27ed464f9aaaddcd510731c5f0

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: Date that signifies which version of the award is effective. Default to current date if not provided

get.description:
Returns the exposed fields of a particular award referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID).

Secured by: Process: Award - Core, View: Award Contract
Scope: Grants

parameters.name: awardId
parameters.description: The Reference-ID(Award_Reference_ID)/WID of an award. You can retrieve the WID of an award by querying the GET/awards API.

get.description:
Return the exposed fields on award lines for a particular instance of an award.

Secured by: Process: Award - Core, View: Award Contract
Scope: Grants

parameters.name: awardId
parameters.description: The Reference-ID(Award_Reference_ID)/WID of an award. You can retrieve the WID of an award by querying the GET/awards API.
